name: Hopeful in Joyful
summary:
A mod for Austin Jorgensen's LISA: The Joyful which includes characters from Taco Salad's LISA: The Hopeful.

Requires LISA: The Joyful to play.

Replaces Buddy with Beltboy, Lanks, Cyclops and Rodriguez.
Changed a lot of battles and re-balanced combat because Joyful's was shit.
Campfire scenes from Hopeful in tha game.
More enemy/player interactions.

A couple endings, a few idk I didn't count.
Like, two new secrets and a song.
A gripping story that will leave you in tears, because it is very very sad, and you are probably going to cry when you beat the game because it is that sad.
Probably some bugs I missed. Point them out to me,.
